Farm Program with three operational projects A Handbook for Farm Management Byeong H. Won 2021-03-26 Preface About 2,500 years ago, Chinese military strategist Sun Tzu wrote The Art of War. In it, he said, Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat. Tactics and strategy are not at odds with one anothertheyre on the same team. (And they have been for many centuries!) 0.1 What is Program ?       . 0.2 What is Project ?       . EPC, O&M, Financing
